title: KonBoot 2 Commercial (ISO)
description:
Probably the world's best remedy for forgotten passwords.

This is in ISO format.  Burn to CD or DVD using your favorite image manipulation software such as Magic ISO or Daemon Tools Pro.

After burning, insert CD or DVD into target computer and boot to media.  If you see the screen that displays "Kon-Boot" it means the target computer was successfully hacked.  If not, don't ask why.

Next, it will appear to boot to Windows like normal.

Next, it will display user login options.  If you select a user and a password is requested, just leave it blank and hit enter and you will have elevated privileges, and will have access to most things.  If you need to do something that it doesn't let you do,and logging in as "Administrator" wasn't an option, then you'll need actual administrator level authorization.

On Windows 7, which is the only OS I've used this on, click START and type "cmd"...

Right click on "cmd.exe" and select "Run As Administrator"

In the "CMD" prompt type 'net user administrator /active:yes'

Don't type the " ' " ... type net user admini...

Now log off the current user and a new user will be available: "Administrator"
